Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsi had just finished taking a shower around 7 am the sky was clear and the sun was shinning bright for the morning it was very clear day. I looked up in the air directly south about 2 miles from the Newport beach Ocean Shoreline and see about 500 feet above me a spinning red egg oval shaped spear spinning craft was flashing brightly different colors of bright lights or they could have been re directed light from the sunlight not sure. I ran outside took about a min or two and looked for the object in the air to my surprise it was spinning alot faster and had ascended out over the ocean and was up about a 1000 feet I showed it to my roommate then about a min later lost sight of it. The UFO was red sphere egg shaped and spinning around slowly at first the object was on a path upward and going south toward the ocean it did seem to be spinning faster as it got higher and was really a very bright light it seemed to be leaving a light emissions trial it was almost like a Christmas tree ornament in every way
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Costa Mesa
There were no other sightings in Costa Mesa on or around February 9th 2012
Summary: Red oval egg shaped sphear floating or hovering slow spinning and flashing bright lights or reflecting sun light emmision trail assending
